attributes.action: Education Needs to Have “Respect” instilled into Children from 5 upwards.
attributes.additional_details:
Ambulance crews get beaten up trying to treat some, Lacking Respect.

The Police say that they Do Not have any Respect from Many Children.

Teachers get Kicked and Attacked from some at Schools.

Churches were once Respected and a No No for any Damage, today they Rob them.

Disabled the Elderly Get no Respect from some who are on they way to be Criminals, Many Elderly fought for them which they Must Respect, it is Cowardly to Attack them, they would not like their Parents attacked.

Sort it ASAP
attributes.background:
Today Many Children Fail to Respect anyone, this causes issues along the years with some getting into Crime.

Respect needs to be Instilled so they look up to Schools and their workers, The Police and Emergency Services, Places of Worship where they have to Lock them up or get Robbed, Shame.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking for a specific subject to be added to the national curriculum, if that's what you want to happen.
